column4: I've gotten XGL to run on my old nvidia geforce 2 card, but it just makes stuff really slow, and won't even run composite stuff.. anyone have a clue?
yeah? what should i use then?
xorg built in composite extenstion with nvidia driver
only thing that works for me is xcompmgr
how do i enable it? if i try to enable desktop effects it just says it can't load them (yes, i have glx and composite enabled)
hm, composite is enabled eh? i assume u have restricted driver installed?
yes. But remember, it's a legacy card. but still
it says Xgl is not present
hm what model of card is that?
sorry i just have never used the legacy card by i'd guess that nvidia shouldnt ask for no xgl
okay.. it just checks if xgl is present, and its not. then it falls back to metacity..
